content: try this easy to follow crochet dog bone pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this amigurumi bone pattern will help you make your own crochet dog toy with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level intermediate crochet skills and knowledge - gauge 2 x 2 14 rounds x 12 stitches - finished size bigger bone length - 21cm 8 width - 9cm 3 5 smaller bone length - 14cm 5 5 width - 6cm 2 5 this crochet dog bone pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern - links to helpful video tutorials - patterns for both the bigger and the smaller bone materials needed - this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend of both i recommend using this weight fine sport #2 = 4 ply or light worsted #3 = dk i used fine sport #2 = 4 ply 55% cotton and 45% acrylic blend 1x ball of yarnart jeans - blue 55 - 50g/160m 1x ball of yarnart jeans - yellow 35 - 50g/160m 1x ball of yarnart jeans tropical - multicoloured 614 - 50g/160m 1x ball of yarnart jeans tropical - multicoloured 616 - 50g/160m equipment needed - crochet hook i used 2 5mm = b/1 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors yarn needle stitch marker polyester stuffing plastic squeaker optional you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet dog bone pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
